scripts.compiletest: pulp build && psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Test.Main --module Test.Main --output runtest.js && java -jar compiler.jar --js runtest.js --js_output_file runtestcomp.js -O SIMPLE
scripts.compiletestdev: npm run devpsc && npm run bundledev && java -jar compiler.jar --js runtestdev.js --js_output_file runtestdevcomp.js -O ADVANCED
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run querytestsql && pulp test
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.querytestsql: npm run schema && npm run testsql
